sentences.en: B : Great! A prank call! That's it. We're going to stay in a hotel tonight.
sentences.cn: 太好了! 一通骚扰电话! 够了. 我们今晚去住酒店.

sentences.en: Dido: a mischievous prank or antic; a caper.
sentences.cn: 胡闹: 一种调皮的恶作剧或胡闹; 鬼把戏.

sentences.en: He was the goat of their vicious prank.
sentences.cn: 他成为他们恶作剧的对象.

sentences.en: In addition, both writers oppose the false love and death through a prank way.
sentences.cn: 另外, 鲁迅与夏目漱石又都以一种近乎戏谑的方式来反对一种虚假的爱与死.

sentences.en: It is controversial whether sow false news on the net april fool's day an online prank.
sentences.cn: 在愚人节时用网路散布不实消息是否算是网路恶作剧引起了争论.

sentences.en: It is said that the warning call made by an anonymous caller proved to a prank.
sentences.cn: 据说匿名报警电话原来是个恶作剧.

sentences.en: It was just a harmless prank, that's all it was.
sentences.cn: 那仅是一次无伤大雅的恶作剧, 仅次而已.

sentences.en: It was thought that the fire alarm had been set off as a prank.
sentences.cn: 人们认为火警报警器响是个恶作剧.

sentences.en: Ms. Luo said she had received prank calls and plenty of criticism.
sentences.cn: 罗兰说她收到了很多恶作剧电话和指责.

sentences.en: My brother shook up my mom's soda, as a prank.
sentences.cn: 我弟弟恶作剧,把我妈的汽水给摇了又摇.

sentences.en: My older sister put me up to making a prank telephone call.
sentences.cn: 是我姐姐怂恿我打这个恶作剧电话的.

sentences.en: One of these skits, " The King of Beasts " resembles a traditional frontier prank.
sentences.cn: 一出滑稽短剧《兽王 》 酷似传统的边疆闹剧.

sentences.en: Some people said this was Kao's prank - a deliberate attempt to break them apart.
sentences.cn: 有人说这是高松年开的玩笑,存心拆开他们俩.

sentences.en: The dean was ranking the boys for pulling the prank.
sentences.cn: 系主任正在惩罚那些恶作剧的男学生.

sentences.en: The nooses are no prank. We were lynched, we were murdered.
sentences.cn: 这些绳套不是恶作剧. 我们被处以了私刑, 我们被谋杀了.

words.tran_cn: 爱开玩笑的人；顽皮的人；恶作剧的人

trans.tran_en: a trick, especially one which is played on someone to make them look silly
to dress or decorate showily or gaudily
